title: Toy box space

properties.name: description
properties.value: Toy box space is a hotspot in the costume room of a player-owned house that is only visible to the player when in building mode.

content:
The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:Toy box space
Toy box space
Released18 October 2006 (Update)
MembersYes
QuestNo
LocationPlayer-owned house (costume room)
OptionsBuild
ExamineStores holiday items.
Advanced data
Object ID18812

Toy box space is a hotspot in the costume room of a player-owned house that is only visible to the player when in building mode.

Contents

  • 1 Uses
  • 2 Creation Menu
  • 3 Toys
  • 4 Changes

Uses[edit | edit source]

Stores event rewards, similar to reclaiming from Diango.

Aside from appearance, there is no difference between each type of toy box.

Creation Menu[edit | edit source]

Key[1] Level Toy box Materials Experience Cost
1 50 Oak toy box Oak plank x2 120 942
2 68 Teak toy box Teak plank x2 180 1,836
3 86 Mahogany toy box Mahogany plank x2 280 4,326
  1. ↑ Press this key on your keyboard while in the Creation Menu to build this item.

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
2 September 2020
(update | poll)

Toy boxes can store partially completed sets.

8 October 2015
(update)

You can once again retrieve the Mask of Balance from a POH Toy box.

31 May 2013
(update)

Toy boxes in Player-Owned Houses have been updated to hold the untradeable 'rare' items that will be released over the summer.

22 February 2013
(update)

This content was included when the Old School RuneScape servers officially launched.
